properties.title: X-ray and Neutron Crystallography Refinement Commands
properties.author: Michael J. Schnieders

section.name: X-ray and Neutron Crystallography Refinement Commands
section.p: Algorithms to optimize an atomic resolution crystal structure against X-ray and/or Neutron diffraction data.

tr.td: The xray.Anneal command runs simulated annealing to optimize a structure using a reciprocal space objective function.
The xray.AverageMTZ command averages multiple MTZ files.
The xray.CIFtoMTZ command converts a CIF diffraction file to MTZ format.
The xray.ComputeFc command writes out computed structure factors.
The xray.Deuterate command deuterates exchangable hydrogen atoms of the PDB model.
Run Dynamics simulations using a reciprocal space objective function.
The xray.ManyBody command globally optimizes the side-chains of a protein using a reciprocal space objective function.
The xray.Minimize command minimizes a system using a reciprocal space objective function.
The xray.ModelvsData command compares the calculated diffraction of the model to measured diffraction data.
The xray.MTZInfo command writes out information on an MTZ file.
The xray.Timer command times the computation of the reciprocal space objective function and gradient.
